A Tour of Duck Launcher

Apps

Access all the apps on your computer in one click. Simply type if you want to search for a particular application.

Files

Browse through your folders and quickly access files.

Favourites

This feature is really useful if you have many projects. An example is the best way to explain it. Say you have a video project, you might want to have easy access to applications (video editor, image editor,etc.), to project folders and files. Then you can create a block(or group) in Duck Launcher's settings, and add all you need to it.

Plugins

Extend your search experience by adding plugins to Duck Launcher. The way this work is very simple: when you are in the apps menu, you can access a plugin like so #example-plugin, and then typing the search query. To install new plugins, type #plugins and press enter, you will access the Plugin Store.

Install Duck Launcher
